snippet.title: A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead - 10 Minutes of Exclusive Gameplay
snippet.description:
Check out 10 minutes of exclusive gameplay from A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead. In this tense gameplay video for A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead, watch a terrifying escape attempt through air ducts and a building in ruins, set on Day 119 of this upcoming single-player horror game inspired by Paramount Pictures’ franchise A Quiet Place. A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2024.

In A Quiet Place: The Road Ahead, experience the harrowing journey of Alex, a young college student suffering from asthma and struggling to survive the end of the world alongside her boyfriend, Martin. But the nightmarish creatures stalking the land aren’t the only threat she’ll have to contend with as she travels through the ruins of civilization in search of a safe haven for herself and her family.

#IGN #Gaming
